__e: Oh, come on. Katherine is exactly where she's always belonged.
Are you sure Katherine's in our world?
I get it. I'm the better, hotter, superior choice, And you're scared now that Katherine's out of the picture
I don't know where Katherine is and even if I did, I wouldn't tell you.
This thing that happened with you and Katherine 12 years ago...
Anyone who's spent the past few years working for Katherine must have accumulated any number of things they've learned not to tell.
There has to be a reason why Katherine tried to kill him.
Katherine, I've been here for three days and I haven't heard from you.
If I could find another way to say it, Katherine, I would.
Last night, Katherine, I came to your room to tell you... ..I don't want to lose you.
